definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: take on pledge, give in pledge, exchange (NH go surety for (rare); Ph. [[ערב]] surety; OAram. [[ערבא]] pledge; Targum [[עֲרַב]], Syr. 9rab, go surety for; usu. identified with I. [[ערב]]—mix, exchange, pledge—but quite uncertain; cf. Buhl:Lex Lag:BN 203);—

c. acc. pers. taken on pledge, i.e. go surety for the safety of, Ge 43:9 (J), Ge 44:32 (J; + [[מֵעִם]] pers.); for the debts of Pr 11:15, Pr 20:16, Pr 27:13; of God Is 38:14 go surety for me, Ps 119:122, so Job 17:3 (si vera l., v. [[עֵרָבוֹן]]); acc. pers. om., [[לְ]] ´[[ע]] Pr 6:1 go surety to one (in behalf of another, ‖[[תָּקַע לַזׇּר כַּפֶָּיְ]]); c. acc. rei Pr 22:26 (‖[[תּׂקְעֵי־כָָף]]).
give in pledge, c. acc. rei Ne 5:3 (i.e. mortagage), fig. [[אֶת־לִבּוֹ]] ´[[ע]] Je 30:21 so [[עֲרֻבָּה לִפְנֵי רֵעֵהוּ]] ´[[ע]] Pr 17:18 (‖[[תּׂקֵעַ כָָּף]]).
exchange (in trade), c. acc. cogn. [[מָעֲרָבֵךְ]] Ez Eze 27:9, Eze 27:27.

definitions.title: Hithp. 1.
definitions.body: recipr.: Imv. [[הִתְעָ֫רֶב נׇא אֶת־אֲדׂנִי]] 2Ki 18:23 exchange pledges (make a bargain) with my lord = Is 36:8.

definitions.title: 2. a.
definitions.body: have fellowship with, [[בְּ]] pers., Pf. 3 pl. [[הִתְעָֽרְבוּ]] Ezr 9:2; Impf. 3 mpl. [[וַיִּתְעָֽרְבוּ]] Ps 106:35; 2 ms. [[תִּתְעָרָָב]] c. [[לְ]] pers. Pr 20:19, c. [[עִם]] pers. Pr 24:21.

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: share in, [[בְּ]] rei, 3 ms. [[יִתְעָרַב]] Pr 14:10 in his joy no other shares..
